title: Where eagles dare (Captioned)
creator_credit: Brian G. Hutton, Elliott Kastner and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: Richard Burton and Clint Eastwood star as Allied agents on a daring suicide mission in this tense wartime adventure. Held captive in an almost impregnable fortress in Bavaria, American General Carnaby is at the mercy of the German High Command. A group of agents attempt to liberate the General but as the mission progresses it becomes apparent that a double agent is attempting to foil this daring plot.
